title: Requirements Phase: test-infrastructure-improvement - Ready for Review
response:
Feedback Summary (1 comments):

General Comments:
1. Group tests into development (as in while a developer is writing new features), CI (where certain things can't be tested, like hardware access) and prepare for production/release

comments.comment: Group tests into development (as in while a developer is writing new features), CI (where certain things can't be tested, like hardware access) and prepare for production/release
